meanings.definition: A place where goods are bought and sold; a market.
meanings.sent1: I went to the mart to buy some fresh vegetables.
meanings.sent2: The mart was bustling with activity as people shopped for groceries.
meanings.sent3: At the mart, I accidentally bumped into a stack of canned goods and they all fell down!
meanings.sent4: The mart was a hive of activity, with vendors calling out their prices like auctioneers.
meanings.sent5: The colorful displays at the mart made shopping a delightful experience.

meanings.definition: A commercial center; a shopping district.
meanings.sent1: The new mart in town has all the latest fashion trends.
meanings.sent2: The mart is a popular spot for locals to gather and socialize.
meanings.sent3: I got lost in the mart trying to find the electronics section!
meanings.sent4: The mart stood tall in the city center, a beacon for shoppers near and far.
meanings.sent5: The lights of the mart twinkled like stars in the night sky.
